data.title: #COFOH is thrilled to announce FRIDAY THE 13TH and RETURN OF THE LIVING DEAD actor Thom Mathews! Thom will be meeting fans, introducing...
data.meta_description:
85 likes, 3 comments - coloradofestivalofhorror on July 11, 2024: "#COFOH is thrilled to announce FRIDAY THE 13TH and RETURN OF THE LIVING DEAD actor Thom Mathews! 

Thom will be meeting fans, introducing FRIDAY THE 13TH PART VI, signing autographs, participating in a Q&A, and doing photo ops all weekend at #ColoradoFestivalOfHorror: Friday the 13th!

Thom played “Tommy Jarvis” in multiple FRIDAY THE 13TH incarnations and joins FRIDAY THE 13TH Part VI writer/director @tommy.mcloughlin as well as fan film writer/director @vincentedisanti. It’s Ki, Ki, Ki, Ma, Ma, Ma, all weekend long. You know the drill--see the link in our bio for tickets and show info!

#ThomMathews began his acting career in the early 1980s and his first major role was Freddy in the 1985 cult classic THE RETURN OF THE LIVING DEAD with Linnea Quigley. The following year, Thom starred in FRIDAY THE 13TH PART VI: JASON LIVES, becoming the third actor to portray Tommy Jarvis. In 1987, he starred as Francis Kelly in the TV film THE DIRTY DOZEN: THE DEADLY MISSION and guest-starred on the sitcom MR. PRESIDENT with George C. Scott. In 1988, he starred as Joey in RETURN OF THE LIVING DEAD PART II and Charmin' in ALIEN FROM L.A. 

In 1990s, he portrayed Tim Murphy in the TV film ROCK HUDSON and David in the horror film MIDNIGHT CABARET. Thom starred in the action films BLOODMATCH and BORN TO RIDE, the sci-fi thriller NEMESIS, portrayed Bill in KICKBOXER 4, and Dan Donahue in IN THE LIVING YEARS. In 1995, Thom starred in the sci-fi film HEATSEEKER and guest-starred on an episode of ER. In 1996, Thom starred in the TV drama films IF LOOKS COULD KILL and RAVEN HAWK.

He reprised the role of Tommy Jarvis twice in 2017, providing his voice and likeness to the video game FRIDAY THE 13TH: THE GAME and making a cameo appearance in the unofficial fan film Vincente DiSanti’s NEVER HIKE ALONE. He repeated the role of Tommy Jarvis in 2022 in another unofficial fan film FRIDAY THE 13TH VENGEANCE 2: BLOODLINES as well as starring in Vincente’s sequels NEVER HIKE IN THE SNOW in 2020 and NEVER HIKE ALONE 2 last year.

#ColoradoFestivalOfHorror #FridayThe13th #horrorfilm #horrormovies #slashermovies #horrorcommunity #denverhorror #coloradohorror".
